title: Cyberslacking Simulation – SWG Audit
description: Test perimeter category and URL policy. YouTube category links only. Blocked = perimeter passed; allowed = perimeter may not enforce restrictions.
keywords: SWG Audit, cyberslacking test, category policy, URL policy, YouTube, perimeter security
headline: Validate the real-world effectiveness of your perimeter security against Cyberslacking
subline: This simulation tests category and URL policy at the perimeter (SWG), not endpoint or device controls. Simulation uses YouTube only. When the SWG blocks non‑productive categories, some links will be blocked. All links load = perimeter may not enforce video‑level restrictions. Run from a device that routes through the perimeter under test.
